Text: Thank you very much Enjoyed a lot
Thank you very much for this share! :D Simply love Enigma ;)
Sorry folks! This is not Enigma, his produktions are far to advance so sound like this. This is ok, but its not Enigma.

This is the album "Wonder - Far off the beaten path", but I like it a lot. Thanks for sharing.
